title: Good afternoon, tell me please, my Bluetooth speaker does not connect to my phone Google Pixel 3XL
content: My phone connects to other devices via Bluetooth but does not connect to a new speaker that I bought I wanted my last Google Pixel to connect the first one it connects quietly And my Google Pixel 3XL sees Bluetooth this device but cannot connect.Google Pixel 3 XL sees this Bluetooth speaker, but when the connection to the Bluetooth speaker is being downloaded, then it does not connect further
